issue.title: [CF 1059] About sound effects
issue.body:
Is sound effect available in tell me when to remind me about some events that I set(for example the trigger of my trinket)? I think it'll be very useful if it have, but i just can't find it....


> Posted by CurseForge user ethereal64 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1059 | Raw

comments.body:
You can configure sounds in the Notifications tab of the Icon Editor.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
